programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: Safety123
programme.desc: Vistos de longe, os Alpes podem parecer uma fantasia pitoresca, mas quem vive no sopé sabe como podem ser ameaçadores.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: Brother's Body
programme.desc: Quando decide (voltar a) mergulhar no mundo do culturismo, David Nicolas Parel ambiciona seguir nas pisadas do seu irmão mais novo e treinar para o Arnold Classic – uma competição que deve o nome ao célebre ator e político austríaco-americano.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Episódios 1-2
programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: 265 Days Without Waves (265 dias sem ondas)
programme.desc: Uma história única e extraordinária sobre a criação por um grupo de surfistas locais de uma comunidade e cultura de surf apesar das limitações, numa costa que mal chega aos 100 dias de ondas por ano. Através das personagens, exploramos a evolução do surf bem como a exponencial mudança socioeconómica de Barcelona e arredores, da década de 1960 até à atualidade. Entre os protagonistas aventureiros e dedicados, conhecemos os pioneiros que nadaram contra a maré e a nova geração que vive e respira o surf de uma forma completamente diferente. Frustração, espera e desespero combinam-se em igual medida com entusiasmo, perseverança e humor.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal é uma história sobre vontade, sonhos, determinação, fé, rebelião, coragem e amor. O filme convida-nos a uma jornada pelos diferentes mundos e altamente variados de Sadio - desde a vida rural numa pequena aldeia no extremo sul de Senegal até aos holofotes do futebol mundial jogando pelo Liverpool FC, vencendo as Ligas dos Campeões como número 10 e ganhando a audiência mundial. A Interação de animações, cenas de documentário, um conjunto diversificado de imagens detalhadas e de arquivo dá vida ao passado de Sadio e cria um excitante enredo cheio de emoções.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Gigantes - Lendas do sumo do Hawaii
programme.desc: Acompanhamos as vidas épicas das lendas do sumo que transcenderam as suas origens humildes no Havai para se tornarem nos primeiros estrangeiros a ascender aos patamares mais elevados do sumo.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Brother's Body
programme.desc: Quando decide (voltar a) mergulhar no mundo do culturismo, David Nicolas Parel ambiciona seguir nas pisadas do seu irmão mais novo e treinar para o Arnold Classic – uma competição que deve o nome ao célebre ator e político austríaco-americano.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Bojan, por trás do sorriso
programme.desc: Depois de retirar-se dos relvados aos 32 anos, Bojan Krkic decide contar a sua história. Através de uma conversa com o psicanalista que o tratou quando da sua estreia com o FC Barcelona aos 16 anos, o documentário explora as dificuldades enfrentadas por um talento precoce e sensível no mundo cruel do futebol. Jogadores que testemunharam a sua carreira de perto, tais como Thierry Henry, Andrés Iniesta e Zlatan Ibrahimovic, partilham o seu ponto de vista sobre Bojan, o futebolista, e Bojan, a pessoa, e refletem sobre a pressão, saúde mental e gestão de expetativas.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", guarda-redes da primeira seleção nacional feminina espanhola, parte de Valencia para Barcelona para conhecer Alexia Putellas, vencedora da Liga dos Campeões da UEFA e da Supertaça Europeia, e Viktoria Adrianova, ambas jogadoras do FC Barcelona. Antes do encontro, Alexia confessa não ser tão impaciente como outrora, Viky emociona-se ao recordar a sua lesão e Kubalita afirma que elas não se esconderam, apesar de os políticos e os meios de comunicação terem subestimado a sua atividade. Assim que se reuniram, trocaram impressões sobre o momento atual do futebol feminino.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Megacities é um documentário sobre as favelas de quatro cidades metropolitanas diferentes: Bombaim, Cidade do México, Moscou e Nova York. O filme é um relato em doze episódios sobre pessoas que lutam para sobreviver com desenvoltura, humor e dignidade.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.desc: Match Point | Noite Europeia

programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock- all day! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, U2, The Damned & Billy Idol.

programme.title: Carol Decker's 30 Rock Chicks!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Carol Decker's 30 Rock Chicks!
programme.desc: T'Pau's Carol Decker brings a bit of Heart & Soul to a countdown of 80s ladies who liked to rock! With Joan Jett, Tina Turner, Stevie Nicks & Pat Benatar.

programme.title: 1988 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1988!

programme.title: Who Won Wot? 1980-1989
programme.desc: From Smash Hits "Most Unwanted Person of 1980" to the Brits "Best Group" of 1989 - Mark Goodier's 10 hour marathon of 80s award winners lasts nearly as long as the Oscars!

programme.title: Chart Toppers!
programme.desc: A choice selection of the 191 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1980s!

programme.title: The Heritage Chart 4th Birthday!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Heritage Chart 4th Birthday!
programme.desc: Celebrating the 4th anniversary of the Heritage Chart - Mike Read welcomes a whole host of famous guests to sing their classic hits on TV - one more time!

programme.title: 80s Party Night!
programme.desc: Queens of soul, kings of hip hop and masters of rave collide in the biggest baddest funkiest party known to man! This will have you dancing!

programme.title: Timmy Mallett's Brilliant 80s!
programme.desc: Loud shirts, foam mallet & 25 huge videos of the decade are ready to go as Timmy Mallett brings his Utterly Brilliant party to NOW 80s!

programme.title: 80s Party Night!
programme.desc: Queens of soul, kings of hip hop and masters of rave collide in the biggest baddest funkiest party known to man! This will have you dancing!

programme.title: Clare Grogan's Tartan Top 30
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Clare Grogan's Tartan Top 30
programme.desc: In the 80s the Scottish scene was vibrant & creative with punk, indie, synth, acoustic & Celtic folk influences topping the charts. Altered Images' Clare Grogan has 30 of the best.

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: One Hit Wonders! 1970-1979
programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.title: American No.1s of 1979
programme.desc: In order - 12 videos that hit the top of the US chart in 1979. Some are obvious, but there are a few surprises along the way! Herb Alpert anyone?

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1979
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1979
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the last year of the decade! It was the year the brand new Sony Walkman launched in Japan & Elton John performed 8 concerts in the USSR.

programme.title: Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.desc: Time to show off your nerdy knowledge as Mike Read quizzes you on the stars and songs of 1979!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1979?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Who Won Wot in 1979?
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with 1979's big music award winners.

programme.title: The Best 1979 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '79 including Blondie, Queen, Abba, ELO, Roxy Music, Chic, Squeeze and more!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1979
programme.desc: 1979 was another top year in music, with pop, disco & new wave rubbing shoulders with rock, synth & 2-Tone. Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: The Best 1979 Party...Ever!

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Pat Sharp's Karaoke Party!

programme.title: 70s School Disco!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Sing It Loud! 1970-1979

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 20 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Bruno Brookes UK Top 20 of the 70s
programme.desc: Including 10 million sellers back when it was still a rare achievement! These are the 20 biggest songs of the decade with Julie Covington, David Soul, Abba, Queen, Blondie & Wings.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: It's all about pork and peanuts, today's challenge is the letter "P." Chef Lauren Gulyas serves up an old school favourite, smothered pork chops. Using a blend of savoury ingredients, and with the help of her cast iron pan, Chef Lauren provides us with tips on how to keep your pork tender and tasty. Next, it's time for a West African peanut soup. Drizzling garlic, ginger and onions with extra virgin olive oil and letting them sizzle in a frying pan until the onions are soft brings out a sweetness that lends itself beautifully to the salty, earthy taste of peanuts. To finish, Chef Lauren puts an Asian twist on a southern classic, when she combines the two ingredients.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: Last things are first for this 'Upside Down' themed One Big Recipe featuring Montreal chef Kimberly Lallouz. Fruit and cheese to start? Why not? Check out her dessert wine poached Grilled Pears and Blue Cheese Salad. Next, Beef Tartare Sliders are spiked with horseradish aioli and served on warm brioche. Pasta follows, but in keeping with her topsy turvy theme, Korean flavour meets Italian savour in her Kimchi Pappardelle. Fish is next, Loup de Mer en Papillote with Ã‰crasé Potatoes is dressed up with shaved fennel and rich beurre rouge sauce. How do you end an inside-outside- upside-downside dinner? With the perfect starter! Check out Kim's Oyster Shooters with Champagne Granité for a...

programme.desc: We start working on a new project with the novice racer in mind. We take a 2008 Ford Crown Vic Police Cruiser and turn it into a budget-friendly Spec Panther racing machine! Today we'll upgrade our transmission for better shifting and give the old power plant a tune-up.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: We show you painting tips on how to properly prep your aging clear coat for paint. Then we give our Mazda a fresh look before heading to the track to test those performance parts!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Our '69 Road Runner, nicknamed Road Burner, gets a big bump in power when we perform a Gen III Hemi engine swap.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: The '69 Road Runner gets an exterior upgrade. We'll show you some unorthodox methods for enhancing a patina paint look.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We do something that has never been done before: build two identical 496 Big Block Chevy engines to run on the dyno...at the SAME TIME!!

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: The Carcass crew found a 2012 Jeep JK at an auction and just had to buy it. They'll tear into it and start adding some off-road suspension components, turning it into a dual-purpose wheeler that can handle some serious trails.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Adding Brakes, Wheels, and Tires is cool, but mechanical and electrical systems have to get buttoned up to revive this 80's lady! Is it finally time to fire up this '85 Buick?

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We build a hot rod 292 Chevy straight-six that puts power to the pavement for Truck Tech's 1965 C10.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: The men hit the road to rescue a viewer's ex-border patrol Bronco with new exterior & interior goodies. Plus custom exhaust for our Klassy K5 Blazer

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: The team ventures to the north Georgia mountains to pick up and test an '07 Jeep Wrangler JK, then we head to the Summit Racing store in search of parts to mod it for extreme off-road fun!

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We do something that has never been done before: build two identical 496 Big Block Chevy engines to run on the dyno...at the SAME TIME!!

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccan Chronicles Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By The Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys her time at Popeye Village.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Spas Kumarakom Lake
programme.desc: Located on the tranquil banks of Vembanad Lake, Kumarakom Lake Resort is enveloped by nature and recognized as one of the best luxury resorts.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Freishia catches the adventure bug on her trip to Mauritius, which leads her to go kite surfing at the gorgeous Le Morne beach. Hungry for more, she goes to Casela Park, a nature reserve where she takes a walk with the big cats of the jungle. An exhilarating zip-line ride through the St. Felix sugar estate makes her realize that these adventures don’t just offer an adrenaline rush but also an exciting new way to appreciate the beauty of Mauritius.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccan Chronicles Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta & JogJakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah begins her backpacking journey in Indonesia from its capital, Jakarta. Understanding the country’s colonial past, she visits Taman Fatahillah and then Sunda Kelapa harbour. Jog Jakarta, popular for the Borobudur temple is her next stop where she also visits the Batik embroidery factory, ending with a joyride on a bling-bling car and visit to Malioboro street.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo & Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah wraps up from Jog Jakarta after her visit to Sultan’s palace and heads to East Java’s capital, Bromo, for a thrilling experience of watching an active volcano. Keeping the adrenalin on, she visits Komodo National Park for sighting the world’s largest reptile - Komodo Dragon.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where they are drawn to traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccan Chronicles Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Pristine beaches, coral reefs and indigenous forests, which are home to rare wildlife – nature truly takes center stage in Mauritius. Freishia’s explorations of this natural wonderland of a country lead her to a nature reserve, which was once used for growing vanilla, but is now a breeding park for Nile river crocodiles.

programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city, Fukuoka.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once an ancient city on the famous Silk Road, Tashkent is a kaleidoscope of mesmerizing art, delectable food, sweeping gardens and eye-catching architecture. Renowned traveller, Alex Outhwaite explores the Uzbekistan capital, where she visits iconic sights such as the Barak-Khan Madrassah, learns about the city’s history, and tries out some local delicacies such as sheesh kebab, horse milk and horse meat.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Join our host as he starts his backpacking journey of Portugal, starting from Lisbon. Exploring important monuments from Belem tower to Portas Do Sol.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty enjoy treks to waterfalls, fishing and a serene beach sunset in Itoshima - a place in Kyushu which calms the soul.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Samarkand, one of the most popular cities of Uzbekistan, is a city littered with monuments, which span a thousand years of history. From the stories of the Silk Road to the life of the legendary king, Timur, Alex Outhwaite learns about the long, rich history of Samarkand through some of its iconic attractions.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Our host travels to Sintra, known for its castles and palaces. Learning and exploring about castles, he further travels to the historic town Obidos.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Great World Hotels Desroches 1
programme.desc: Seychelles is a country of pristine white sandy beaches and turquoise waters that harbour colourful coral reefs and bountiful marine life. Travel enthusiast, Freishia Bomanbehram comes to this tropical paradise looking for fun and relaxation. As she tucks into fresh seafood, goes snorkeling and tries out some catch and release fishing, she realizes that Seychelles has ruined her for all other beach holidays.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek travels to Coimbra. Where he visits the Santa Cruz Church, a park and Santa Claire monastery. Concluding with a visit to Coimbra University.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan, and visit its source.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore Japan’s very own Venice. They also see a garden that is straight out of a fantasy.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek today travels to Porto, surrounded by chapela, monasteries and churches. He visits a Wine cellar and learns about wine production of Portugal.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Great World Hotels Desroches 2
programme.desc: Seychelles, with its idyllic natural beauty and slow-paced life is the perfect destination to commune with nature. When Freishia visits this cluster of jewels in the Indian Ocean, she chances upon a tortoise feeding pen and her conversation with the team there gives her insights into the efforts taken by the Island Conservation Society to preserve the beauty of Seychelles.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack Duoro Valley, Portugal
programme.desc: Our host travels to Douro Valley and is seen exploring vineyards and learning about the history behind it. Concluding his journey at Troia and Évora.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: From the swords of the Samurai to hidden Christian churches, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty get to know some intriguing sides to Japan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Heritage Agra, India
programme.desc: Travel back in time and explore the monuments and architecture built by the Mughals such as the Taj Mahal and Agra Fort in Agra and Fatehpur Sikri Fort in Fatehpur Sikhri.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with Sakurajima, a fuming volcano in Kyushu.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E40 Best From The Rest Ethiopian Experiences
programme.desc: Ethiopia, the country where mankind has its roots, where the Blue Nile has its source and where human beings first woke up and smelled the coffee, is truly a land of life-affirming experiences. Here is a guide to the top five enriching experiences in this ancient and often overlooked African destination that will nourish your soul.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: Located in the ceremonial county of Wiltshire in southwestern England is the prehistoric Stonehenge Avebury. A 'Henge monument'... Stonehenge literally means 'menhirs' or upright monumental stones

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out some of the best places in Kyushu to try out some local hard liquor, and bonito, a local seafood delicacy.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: The symbol of eternal love, a masterpiece of marble and one among the seven wonders of the world - Taj Mahal - is a tomb built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan for his beloved wife Mumtaz Mahal.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya visits Oriole Villas where she explores Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish, witnesses a traditional dance performance, followed by a visit to Galapath temple and Sea turtle hatchery the next day and ends the day with a visit to a water sport center.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: A stunning contrast of deserts, mountains and beaches, its unspoilt landscape, dotted with grand forts, exquisite palaces, undulating dunes, canyons and lush wadis.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.desc: The F1 Connection: News and analysis from the top racing series in the world.

programme.title: Adventure Bike
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 Adventure Bike: Episode 4: Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT
programme.desc: Clare gets to ride the Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT, but do it's retro rally looks match the engine? Tales from the Trails has the lads get the sidecar onto the Trans Euro Trail, before visiting a race track. Graham talks about his Bromance with his motorcycling inspiration, and Sam starts his rally dream with a build and roadbook training, which doesn't go to plan.

programme.title: FIA Karting
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E05 FIA Karting: Round 5: Kristianstad
programme.desc: The much-loved 1221m Åsum Ring circuit, will host this major event in an ideal setting for spectacular battles. The many international competitions that have taken place at Kristianstad over the last few years bode well for a top-quality event in the heart of Skåne, close to Denmark.

programme.title: David Hobbs: Racer and commentator
programme.desc: David Hobbs, the subject of this Windsor Interview, is much more than just a former racing driver who won on a multitude of different circuits throughout the world in a wide variety of machinery.

programme.title: More Banned F1 Tech
programme.desc: More Banned F1 Tech

programme.title: 2024 Hail International Rally - Full Review
programme.desc: The Hail International Rally has entered its fifth year on the agenda of the 2024 FIA World Rally Championship. The first round of the Saudi Toyota Championship was hosted on February 8-10, 2024, in the city of Hail.

programme.title: Why Red Bull Must Escape their "Vicious Cycle" to Win Both F1 Titles in 2024
programme.desc: Compared to the opening half of the season, where Max Verstappen utterly dominated the F1 grid, Red Bull has had less success - especially highlighted in the Italian Grand Prix where Verstappen finished 6th, Sergio Perez in 8th. But is this purely McLaren, Ferrari and Mercedes improving beyond the RB20's capabilities, or has Red Bull taken a step back, between Adrian Newey's announced departure and other problems in the team? Bryn Lucas discusses all this and more with Jake Boxall-Legge and Filip Cleeren in the wake of Red Bull's lackluster results in Monza.

programme.title: Driving Through Time: Petter Solberg behind the wheel of some iconic WRC cars of the past 50 years!
programme.desc: This year the World Rally Championship celebrates 50 years of competition. Over the years the championship has witnessed some truly iconic cars across five definitive eras. To understand how the championship has progressed we pitched 2003 world rally champion Petter Solberg the challenge of driving a rally car from each WRC era at the Goodwood Festival of Speed.

programme.title: Carbon Fibre vs Liveries - What F1 Needs to Bring Colour Back
programme.desc: F1's 2024 season may have kicked off, but during the pre-season events, bare carbon fibre kept catching our eyes. It was an interesting novelty a few years ago, but in 2024, fans are missing the bright, colourful paint schemes of previous years. To understand more, Jon Noble chatted with Mark Turner, Co-Founder and CEO of Silverstone Paint Technology, who works with the majority of the F1 grid, to find out more.

programme.title: Piastri's Perfect Performance - F1 Azerbaijan GP Race Reaction
programme.desc: McLaren's Oscar Piastri took a phenomenal second career win in Baku after battling with polesitter Charles Leclerc. Mercedes' George Russell took a surprising podium after a dramatic late crash between Sergio Perez and Carlos Sainz. Alex Kalinaukas and Jake Boxall-Legge dive into all the highlights and controversies of the 2024 Azerbaijan Grand Prix.

programme.title: Adrian Newey Confirmed - Are Aston Martin Set for F1 Success?
programme.desc: Despite it being possibly F1's worst kept secret in recent years, today Aston Martin announced that Adrian Newey will join the F1 team, starting March 2025 as Managing Technical Partner as well a shareholder - for an eye-watering amount of money too. But does Adrian Newey complete Lawrence Stroll's dream lineup for Aston Martin to succeed in F1 and fight for championship titles? Jon Noble and Ben Hunt chat at Aston's facilities.

programme.desc: In episode 5 of Motorbike TV, Graham Hoskins takes some time to indulge Lara Small’s love of all things Ducati with a comparison of the Panagale V4S vs the Multistrada. In 10-in-10 Graham and Charley Boorman interview Sam and Clare Farah, hosts of our sister show Adventure Bike TV, and then Sam, Graham and Tom Woodrow return to the Peak Districts in Tales from the Trails. In the penultimate Motorcycle Olympics, the team tackle their greatest challenge yet: The Quarry.

programme.title: Driving La Carrera: Rally Brothers
programme.desc: The world’s greatest auto races fuel every driver’s passion for competition and adventure. But one race offers something more. La Carrera Panamericana unites competitors unlike any other race. This unity is the Spirit of La Carrera. This spirit gave birth to the documentary “Driving La Carrera, Rally Brother.” Two brothers, Chris and Jeff Mason, find out that racing in the Carrera Panamericana is more than just winning.

programme.title: Xtreme Verbier - 20-jähriges Jubiläum - Teil 2
programme.desc: Verbier - seit vielen Jahren eine der besten Off-Piste-Locations der Welt und Austragungsort des legendären Finales der Freeride World Tour, feierte das "Xtreme Verbier" sein 20-jähriges Jubiläum. Die steile und zerklüftete 500 Meter lange Felswand des Bec des Rosses war in den letzten zwei Jahrzehnten die Herausforderung für alle Rider - Zeit für einen Rückblick!

programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria wird auch 2023 wieder die besten Beachtennis-Spieler der Welt mit der Sand Series ITF Beachtennis Gran Canaria empfangen. Der Strand von Las Canteras wird vom 9.-14. Mai den idealen Rahmen für eine Meisterschaft von internationalem Format bieten.

programme.title: GKA Magazine #2 Kite-Surf World Cup
programme.desc: Auf der kapverdischen Insel Sal gibt es eine der besten Wellen der Welt. Ponta Preta erfreut sich perfekter rechtsdrehender Wellen, die sich um die felsige Landzunge winden. Für die Qatar Airways GKA World Tour ist es der ideale Ort, um die Kitesurf-Saison 2023 zu eröffnen.

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #02
programme.desc: Beachvolleyball der WeltklasseZum dritten Mal in Folge ist Hamburg Gastgeber eines Queen & King of the Court-Turniers. Vom 25. bis 28. Mai werden wieder die Besten der Besten in die Hafenstadt an der Elbe reisen, um die Titel der Königinnen und Könige zu erkämpfen.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2023 - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Golden Roof Challenge, Home of the Golden Fly Series, ist eine weltbekannte Stabhochsprung- und Weitsprungsveranstaltung. Sie wird am 7. Juni zum 19. Mal im Herzen von Innsbruck, Österreich, ausgetragen.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Brasilia Classic 2023 (BRA)
programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 im italienischen Vieste. Die Windsurfer werden ihr Können auf dem Wasser zeigen und uns ein wenig Wassersport-Action auf dem Mittelmeer bieten.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)

programme.title: Biggest Peak Project IV
programme.desc: 1. A world premiere: being the first speed flyers ever to descent Europe’s most active volcano: Mount Etna in Sicily (ITA)2. The peak project heads north to the Lofoten where a girls team attempts to summit and ski down the highest peak in the region

programme.title: FAI World Air Games - Teil 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games, is the premier international multi-discipline air sports event fielding the world’s top athletes. The 2015 edition of the FAI World Air Games has been awarded for the first time to Dubai.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Heroes
programme.desc: The best riders at the best mountains - that´s the Freeride World Tour! We´re going to introduce some of the key players of the tour, from experienced veterans to hungry rookies.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 K1 WGP Opening Round Osaka 2006
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2006 Final.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 01: Stockholm from the Ericsson Globe in Stockholm, Sweden on May 26, 2012. This event featured the world title fight for the inaugural Glory Heavyweight championship between Semmy Schilt and Errol Zimmerman as headliner. The event also featured qualification bouts for the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: From the Forest National in Brussels, Belgium on October 6, 2012. This event featured a super fight between Remy Bonjasky and Anderson Silva as headliner, Also this event featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.desc: From the PaloLottomatica in Rome, Italy on November 3, 2012. This event featured the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament final 8 Quarter Finals, Semifinals and Final. Albert Kraus withdrew from the tournament due to the flu and was replaced by Yoshihiro Sato.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In this rematch, Roman Zentzov and Kristof Midoux, two heavyweight fighters try to out-strike and outlast each other for a second time. Amand a Buckner, the fearsome American, has her hands full with Hitomi Akano, a judo champion and skilled all-round fighter. This fight drew some of the biggest cheers during the live PPV event in St Petersburg. Reknown Russian fighter Andrei Semenov put his exceptional takedown defense, stamina and throws to the test against the hard striking Jorge Santiago.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.desc: Episode 101 - We know the biggest disasters happen under the roof, in the garage, and in the backyard too. So get ready for the funniest videos that showcase the biggest home disasters, see which one gets the Royal Disaster Badge Of Honor.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Love To Prank You Mom
programme.desc: Episode 1 - Moms are always the best to scare prank. Why? Because they fall for it every time and their loud reactions are the best. It's great that these moms are being good sports, but just remember they know how to prank back. Moms know best! Here are out funniest picks for mom pranks.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Madness - Fails Finals
programme.desc: Episode 1 - It's time to gear up March Madness! Madness Fail Finals is packed with hilarious backyard basketball blunders and court side campiness.

programme.title: S01 E01 - Prank Party
programme.desc: Prank Party is your destination for the funniest prank videos ever! You know you love watching people get startled, scared, and anything in-between! That's what Prank Party is all about - because it's all in good fun! From family pranks to Halloween pranks... pranking is our love language. Hosted..

programme.title: S01 E01 - Quotable Kids
programme.desc: You'll never guess what these funny kids are going to say next! Quotable Kids features the funniest kid sayings and home videos from the America's Funniest Home Videos library and they're going to make you laugh... a little TOO hard! Hosted by Angelina Spicer

programme.title: S01 E01 - The Best Pet Show Ever
programme.desc: Welcome to the funniest pet show anywhere in the WORLD! We know that's a bold claim, but it's true! We have gathered all of the funniest animal clips from the AFV library, and comedian host Matt O'Brien takes you on an adventure through the wonder world of pets! Join us for the laughs, the fur, and..
